page.title: 16HOUSING.
page.content: There is a variety of housing in our area.Many of the detached houses are individually designed, some dating back to 1800.Some of the very old houses are farm houses or farm buildings which have been modernised.The oldest houses are built of stone,the newer ones are brick and cement rendered. In 1977 a large Terrace of 3 and 4 bedroom council houses was built Almost every house has a bathroom,inside toilet and central heating.All of the houses have a garden,some with vegetable plots, orchards and flowerbeds others with lawns and shrubs. Garden furniture like swinging seats, hammocks,benches and sun loungers are popular.Play apparatus like climbing frames,swings and slides can be found in many gardens.
